# uptimekuma_notification_discord (Resource)

Discord notification resource



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Notification name
- `webhook_url` (String, Sensitive) Discord webhook URL

### Optional

- `apply_existing` (Boolean)
- `channel_type` (String) Discord channel type
- `disable_url` (Boolean) Disable URL in Discord notification
- `is_active` (Boolean)
- `is_default` (Boolean)
- `post_name` (String) Post name for Discord webhook
- `prefix_message` (String) Prefix message for Discord notifications
- `thread_id` (String) Discord thread ID
- `username` (String) Username to display in Discord

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
